phrases: I thought you would be back before us.
Yeah, you could call it that.
In the end, they just play dirty.
Someone elbowed me as soon as we started.
It made me lose all desire to run.
Everyone is desperate to secure a good position.
If it is a race for the best time,
we should run one at a time and then compare results.
Kakeru, you do not get it, do you?
There was no one running near you.
I felt bad to be wearing the same uniform as you.
You finished third in your first race.
I heard lots of people asking, who was that?
Everyone was talking about you, especially the girls.
I wish I had the girls' attention.
He does not want to comment.
It did not go as well as I would hoped.
But I could not get the right pace.
It really hurts when there are winners and losers.
Is not our goal to achieve official records,
so we can run in the Hakone Ekiden qualifier?
Since none of us did, it was a crushing defeat.
Did not Kakeru and Haiji make it?
You do not need to count them.
I did not even beat my personal record from practice.
If anything, experiencing the difference was a major achievement.
We will overcome that in our upcoming practices, and...
We will make it in time running like this?
In two weeks, we will attend the Kikui Uni track meet.
We will practice even harder to prepare for it.
We will start on a new training schedule tomorrow,
You need to cool down after a race.
There is no need to rest an entire day.
Long distance running is all about practicing every day.
I do not mind starting right now.
I am saying we should be taking today's results just that seriously.
We are running at Hakone, are not we?
Hey, what is gotten into you?
Then what are we doing now?
This is just a party, is not it?
I thought it was a review session.
You had too much to drink.
I think this kind of thing is necessary, too.
After all, we are a team.
We will practice hard starting tomorrow.
I am telling you, we should take tomorrow off.
I think it is supposed to rain.
Your jeans do absorb a lot of water.
It is not that I do not understand how you feel.
But I understand how they feel, too.
It takes courage to face something head on.
That is something you should have by the time you start.
It is amazing that you were able to compete with Fujioka.
There was nothing I could do during that final lap.
There was nothing we could do from our first lap.
That is why we should be taking this more seriously.
Should I she would some flesh or she would some bone?
You know that, do not you?
Running today reaffirmed something for me.
My body's not suited to long distance.
but it was a close race between me and King, who took some time off.
Is that why you quit running?
My coach told me to quit.
Oh, I do not resent him for it.
If anything, I felt relieved then.
But that means you were frustrated, right?
That is why you told me.
It means you cannot give it up.
I was frustrated, but it is also the reason I was happy, too.
I never thought I would get to taste that again.
Let us both give everything we have.
So we are back to how we started?
He wants to run at his own pace starting today.
Nico-chan Senpai said he wanted to try running at his own pace
You sure he did not just skip?
It sounds like this thing is groaning!
You are going to curse us!
You guys do not need to be here.
Yeah, but we cannot move anymore.
Maybe we can take a bath tomorrow.
Is not that what you said yesterday?
Is that what you have been shopping for?
There must be a cheaper one somewhere...
You should go to Yuki's room.
He would never let me in his room.
You are right, especially not if they went with you.
I will try the same spot.
Why are you in such a bad mood?
Anyway, Prince, does this mean you want to run now?
No, but he is been pestering us to practice all the time.
I would like to at least be able to read comics while I do.
This mouse is so hard to use.
No, it is not a mouse!
It is so I would not accidentally smoke.
Are you a fan of Joe?
That is not what I was trying to do.
You do not know, you idiots?
In order to lose weight, he did not allow himself to drink a single drop of water.
He is a legendary boxer who ultimately died while standing in the ring.
Do not die while standing during the Hakone Ekiden.
Do not say such ominous things.
I am going to buy a treadmill!
The buy button is so far...
Our fixed-pace runs are twice as long.
The build-up runs have increased a lot, too.
I considered each of you individually.
We will increase the intensity of practice in any way we can.
I am sure we can do it.
Build-up runs are speed training, right?
They are exhausting and hard on your legs.
Yuki, you finally feel like running?
I am just worried about you guys!
If we injure ourselves, we will have nothing.
Some of you will struggle with build-ups,
so I have incorporated interval runs, as well.
Were you listening to what Yuki said?
Let us split into two groups.
What do you think I can do?
We are exhausted from practice today.
Then, even though we have stepped up practice, we will not have gained anything.
We were jogging at night for other reasons.
But I am too exhausted to recruit.
Practice lasts until we get home.
Teacher says the field trip lasts until we get home.
You have got energy to spare.
I am really thinking about quitting today.
We should not quit what we have started.
He sure is fast, is not he?
but the sauna is pretty bad, too.
I am sure you know, but Nico-chan Senpai's pushing himself too hard.
Having a fast guy tell him he can do it probably makes him feel like he can.
What is the hardest part about section 8?
King seems to be doing well.
When he mentioned the Ekiden in his afternoon interview,
it was apparently received very well.
Did you get enough to eat?
Food tastes better since I stopped smoking.
It is important to let your muscles rest.
I got plenty of rest this past month.
Are not you going for Hakone?
The twins told me you were looking for a treadmill.
My family's got one they do not use.
I will have them ship it here.
You should have said so sooner!
Is... Is such a miracle possible?!
They are keeping it in the she would.
They were going to throw it away.
When one door shuts, another opens.
My alphabetical order, my alphabetical order...
You got a great deal, Prince.
I have never seen Prince move so much!
I am going to the field.
Two weeks until the next meet, huh?
I am getting into shape right now.
Are you sure that is right?
I do not think that is possible.
That is the same as two weeks ago!
You do not need to run at the next meet.
Only the members who have not achieved official records will attend.
Is it because my time has not improved?
In that case, it is better that I run.
If I run, I can get back in shape.
You cannot see yourself right now.
Then where can I leave my record?
There is always more track meets.
In the first place, we have focused our aim on Hakone
Are you telling me to waste an entire year?
It will all be for nothing if I do not leave a record.
Is running for you all about speed and abandoning those who fall behind?
We are not even guaranteed to run in the Hakone Ekiden qualifier.
Matching their half-assed speed will not make me any faster.
No one here is running half-assed!
Why will not you try to acknowledge that everyone is trying their best?
Is it because they are slower than you?
Is speed the only thing that matters to you?
Then there is no reason to run.
It is not enough to just chase speed.
If you are only able to achieve the same time at the next meet,
